summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein discussing his plans to attend the Democratic Convention with an individual named Jamie. The email reflects a casual tone and mentions the quietness of August as the month comes to an end.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his upcoming plans.

persons.name: Jamie
persons.context: Jamie is mentioned as Epstein's companion for the Democratic Convention.

connections.description: Epstein and Jamie are planning to attend the Democratic Convention together, indicating a social connection.

events.title: Democratic Convention Attendance
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein plans to attend the Democratic Convention with Jamie.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein on August 21, 2008.
Epstein mentions attending the Democratic Convention with an individual named Jamie.
The tone of the email is casual, reflecting on the quietness of August.
